import React, { useContext, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import mintPic from '../../Resources/Images/portfolio-mint2048.png'; import cashflowPic from '../../Resources/Images/portfolio-cashflowjs.png'; import heromatchupsPic from '../../Resources/Images/portfolio-heromatchups.png'; import realityCalcPic from '../../Resources/Images/portfolio-realitycalc03.png'; import chatplusPic from '../../Resources/Images/logo-640x400.png'; import './style.css' import { DataContext } from '../../Context/DataContext' const Projects = (props) => { const { setPageLocation } = useContext(DataContext) const hiddenRef = useRef(); useEffect(() => { window.addEventListener('scroll', scrollHandler); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', scrollHandler); }, []); const scrollHandler = () => { if(window.pageYOffset + window.innerHeight >= hiddenRef.current.offsetTop + 125) { setPageLocation('projects') } } let rowStyle = { display:'none', } return (

ChatPlus

ChatPlus is a Google Chrome extension that adds features to Rumble's livestream chat

<>Features include:
  • User mention highlighting
  • Easy user tagging
  • Full size chat
  • Username color themes

Check it out

Hero Matchups API

The Hero Matchups API is a character matchup and counter resource created for e-sports training and practice applications. Check out a live demo using resources for Blizzard's team-based first person shooter Overwatch 2 here.

Visit the repository

RealityCalc.com

Lead developer for RealityCalc.com, home to the popular online tool The Male Reality Calculator hosted at RealityCalc.com. Built with React and Redux, the calculator uses U.S. Census Bureau statistics to calculate the user's odds of meeting their dream woman.

Check it out

CashFlow JS

CashFlow JS is an adaptation of the CashFlow 101 board game with additional gameplay options and rule customization that allows for many unique ways to play.

Check out CashFlowJs

Mint 2048

Mint is a sliding tile puzzle game where players combine tiles, perform combos and use abilities to create the 2048 tile.

Check out Mint 2048

) } export default Projects;
